Text: Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩ ge̩, Defid tu Jihofa ene kakini, Omi ate̩gu nyʼewo Judaʼka? Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Mute̩gu alo. Taku Defid kakini, E-ugbo nate̩gu nyi? Tak i kakini, Lo tu He̩bro̩n.
Abe̩le̩ Defid mute̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ kpʼamo̩ya-wñ meji, Ahinoam, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩, kpʼAbige̩l, o̩ya Nebal e̩ne̩ Karme̩l le̩.
Oñ Defid kʼaboke̩le̩ okoke du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ wa kpai abo unyi-ma. Ma la fʼodo do ewo ewo He̩bro̩n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda lewa, oñ ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji o̩mo̩ kʼi jʼonu abunyi Juda.
Taku Defid fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo Jebe̩sh-gilead, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, abu ku me̩ mo̩la ñwu So̩l, odu-me̩, ku me̩ la mʼu du ji.
Fai Jihofa ki chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ochochi ñw ame̩ ke: abe̩le̩ omi ñʼadʼakoji e̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩ tod e̩wñ ku me̩ che-i.
Todule̩ me̩ fʼo̩wo̩ gbiti fai, ku me̩ chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩; todu So̩l, odu-me̩ leku, abunyi Juda laño̩ mʼumi du jʼonu-ma ge̩.
Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kʼi chʼonu ogu So̩l le̩, la mʼIshbo̩she̩t o̩ma So̩l du daba nyi Mahanaim e̩gba le̩ me̩;
oñ i du owñ jʼonu Gilead kpai abo Ashur kpai Je̩zree̩l kpai Ifraim kpai Be̩njamin kpai abo Israe̩l chaka.
O̩do̩ Ishbo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l le̩ chʼo̩gbo̩ meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l, i la jʼonu-wñ o̩do̩ meji. Abo unyi Juda muda tu Defid ubi.
Oñ iko ku Defid jʼonu abo unyi Juda He̩bro̩n chʼo̩do̩ mebie kpai ochu me̩fa.
Oñ Abina o̩ma Ne̩r le̩ kpai amadu Ishbo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l, kwo Mahanaim nyi Gibeo̩n.
Taku Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, kpai amadu Defid dufu, oñ ma de kpai ama ugbo abukpe omi e-Gibeo̩n; taku ma kwoguguane̩, aboʼka jʼo̩wo̩ʼka abukpe omi le̩, abomune̩ la jʼo̩wo̩ ekeji abukpe omi le̩.
Taku Abina ka ñwu Joab kakini, Agba, e̩ ki je̩ ñw abokolobia kwane̩ ku ma chiya o̩gba-wa-i. Taku Joab kakini, Ma kwane̩ ke n!
Taku ma kwane̩, oñ ma mudaba aluka aluka: abo me̩gweji kwane̩ todu Be̩njamin kpai Ishbo̩she̩t o̩ma So̩l, amadu Defid me̩gweji ño̩ kwane̩ ge̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ gwo̩nyʼekeji-wñ oji, tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ gwunyʼekeji-wñ akolo; abe̩le̩ ma lewane̩ alukate; todu le̩ ma do̩ ugbo kide̩ ko̩ He̩lkathazurim, owñ de̩ Gibeo̩n.
Tak ogu kpuna tabale o̩jo̩ le̩: oñ amadu Defid fʼAbina kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l du.
Amo̩ma Ze̩ruaya me̩ta la jʼo̩mo̩, ama che Joab kpai Abishai kpai Asahe̩l; e̩re̩ Asahe̩l la ale̩ dab egbi oko.
Oñ Asahe̩l rano Abina; oñ eno kʼi ano Abina alo i na tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Tak Abina dejubi, oñ i kakini, Asahe̩l, uwe̩ de̩? Tak i dohi kakini, Omi de̩.
Tak Abina ka ñw u kakini, Muna tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi-we̩ le̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩nyʼokolobiaʼka kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ko. Asahe̩l muda ko̩ ena bʼo̩ ubi te̩.
Tak Abina ño̩ ka ñwu Asahe̩l ge̩ kakini, Muna tʼo̩wo̩ʼka bʼumi ubi te̩; e̩wñ chi kʼu nagwo we̩ da jʼane̩? E̩gbale̩ ab u nale kʼu nachi eju-mi go Jo̩ab, o̩maye-we̩?

I muda ko̩ ena tʼo̩wo̩ʼka; todule̩ Abina mʼofe o̩kwo̩-wñ du gwunyʼu o̩la. O̩kwo̩ le̩ mu da dufu ubi-wñ; oñ i lewane̩ o̩mo̩, i leku e̩re̩re̩ le̩. Tak abo du ku ma wʼugbo kʼAsahe̩l wane̩ kʼi ku le̩, kwodago.
Joab kpʼAbishai muda rano Abina; oñ e̩gba ku ma lewa uwo Ama olu tunyane̩, owñ chʼuwo ki dʼo̩gba Gia ej o̩na aje̩tachi Gibeo̩n.
Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin kʼo̩la-ma jeju tʼAbina ubi, oñ ma mud udala, ma la kwodago oj uwoʼka.
Tak Abina do̩ Joab, oñ i kakini, O̩kwo̩chageli akʼone̩ mi ogbegbele̩? Uwe̩ ma ka kʼukpoji-wñ achʼulikoko e̩do̩ n? Ab i akpo̩kpe̩ kade tak uwe̩ aka ñw amone̩-i ku ma mudabi b etʼamo̩maye-ma ubi te̩?
Taku Joab kakini, Oji O̩jo̩, i ma chʼabu kʼe̩ ka-i n, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo-i ma kwo bʼetʼo̩maye-wñ ubi te̩ odudu chuu.
Taku Joab fʼo̩kakachi fa, oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka kwodago, ma ño̩ nʼabo Israe̩l ule ge̩ n, ma laño̩ ja ge̩ n.
Tak Abina kpʼabo-wñ lule̩ agu ef Araba du odu gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩; taku ma mu Jo̩rdan daba, oñ ma le gu efu Bitro̩n du chaka, taku ma lewa Maha-naim.
Joab mudabi bʼetʼAbina ubi te̩; oñ e̩gba kʼi f ʼamone̩ le̩ chaka do̩ jeju, abo kʼi chi kwef amadu Defid chʼone̩ me̩gwe̩la manyʼAsahe̩l.
Amadu Defid muda fʼabo Be̩njamin kpʼabo Abina kpa gbogbo tak one̩-ma oli mebie nyoke me̩gwa leku.
Taku ma mʼAsahe̩l du, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji ata-wñ ki de̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m. Taku Joab kpʼabo-wñ lule̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩ oñ o̩jo̩ ñwa ke̩re̩bʼuma He̩bro̩n.
